subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Nevada boxing regulators revoked Zab Judah's license and fined him $250,000 for a melee at last month's welterweight title fight with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
snippet: Nevada boxing regulators revoked Zab Judah's license and fined him $250,000 for a melee at last month's welterweight title fight with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
